content: I'll get the bike detailed and take some high-quality photos to showcase its condition. I'll also research the market to determine a fair and competitive price. I've been thinking about listing it on Craigslist and eBay Motors, but I'll also consider Cycle Trader and Facebook Marketplace. Do you think I should highlight the fact that the bike has been stored in a garage for over a year and hasn't been ridden in that time? Should I also mention that I've been using my dad's pickup truck to haul materials for my DIY projects, and that's why I haven't had time to ride the bike recently?
